graph_title: 정보에 대한 대중의 접근을 보장하는 헌법, 법률, 정책을 채택하고 이행하는 국가의 수
indicator_name: 정보에 대한 대중의 접근을 보장하는 헌법, 법률, 정책을 채택하고 이행하는 국가의 수
target_name: 국내법 및 국제조약에 따라 정보에 대한 대중의 접근성을 보장하고 기본적인 자유를 보호

en.target: Ensure public access to information and protect fundamental freedoms, in accordance with national legislation and international agreements
en.title: Number of countries that adopt and implement constitutional, statutory and/or policy guarantees for public access to information
en.indicator_name: Number of countries that adopt and implement constitutional, statutory and/or policy guarantees for public access to information
en.un_custodian_agency: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization - Institute for Statistics (UNESCO-UIS)
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 82.8 KB)
en.page_content:
**Non-statistical indicator**
▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
